domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@MattHancock It's not sport. It's cruel. And pointless. If people want to go round and round a track/over hedges etc they should do without forcing horses to participate.

Obviously horseracing is far more important than PPE, decent pay for key workers or a coronavirus vaccine.
